resources.string: add this app “%1$s” into freeze list？
remove this app “%1$s” from freeze list？

"all app" means this include system software, this list i\'m not suggest forzen. it maybe let system crash or a system function is invalid and so on. \n\n"user app"means thia only include software installed by users. notmally it can be forzen, but it may be let software can\'t run their service.
